channel.title: Creative Archive
channel.description: Don't miss out on novelties from The Creative Archive!

item.title: All Tutorials
item.description: All Tutorials in the Creative Archive

item.title: All Resources
item.description: All Resources in the Creative Archive

item.title: Puzzlescript Game Bar
item.description: About the All Tutorials All Pedro PSI's puzzlescript games make use of a "game bar" with features such as a undo/reset buttons, level selector, a music on/off button and a fullscreen button. This is how it looks like: How to use the All Tutorials in your site Step 1: including the co...

item.title: Puzzlescript Game Bar
item.description: About All Tutorials How to playControls - keyboard Move with the arrow keys, and push blocks of different shapes. Level difficulty is shown by the number of stars (1 to 5). Press Z to undo a move. Press R to restart the level. Controls - touchscreenTap to simulate pressing X and swipe to simulate an arrow keypress.Real-time feedbackPress F anytime to provide real-time feedback! Much appreciated!Level navigationUsing the Level Selector Menu (below in the game bar) you can navigate freely Hall of fameOnce you beat All Tutorials, you'll be invited to enter the Hall of Fame! As soon as you pass the final credits screen after winning, you'll be able to type your name in a new window. Make sure you are connected to the internet, then press Submit to be remembered forever or close the window t...CommunityGuestbookEnjoyed All Tutorials? Add your message below to the Creative Archive's guestbook!Leave your message! CreditsAll Tutorials by Pedro PSI, 2019.MusicBackground music by .Game EngineMade with Puzzlescript.Inspect the source freely, but consider supporting the Creative Archive! Featured in Blogs Bart Bonte 's blog Pedro PSIIF-ALIAS's ãã©ã·ã¥ - ç¡æã²ã¼...

item.title: Classed as 'Learning'
item.description: About Burokku Konekuta Tidiness rules in All Tutorials. Connect all the scattered pieces together to regain the harmony within your puzzled mind. How to playControls - keyboard Move with the arrow keys, and push blocks of different shapes. Level difficulty is shown by the number of stars (1 to 5). Press Z to undo a move. Press R to restart the level. Controls - touchscreenTap to simulate pressing X and swipe to simulate an arrow keypress.Real-time feedbackPress F anytime to provide real-time feedback! Much appreciated!Level navigationUsing the Level Selector Menu (below in the game bar) you can navigate freely between all levels.Hall of fameOnce you beat Burokku Konekuta, you'll be invited to enter the Hall of Fame! As soon as you pass the final credits screen after winning, you'll be able to type your name in a new window. Make sure you are connected to the internet, then press Submit to be remembered forever or close the window t...CommunityGuestbookEnjoyed Burokku Konekuta? Add your message below to the Creative Archive's guestbook!Leave your message! CreditsBurokku Konekuta by Pedro PSI, 2019.MusicBackground music by Ju-nya.TrackYearLicenseTraffic Information2012CC-BY 3.0 Breeze2012CC-BY 3.0Game EngineMade with Puzzlescript.Inspect the source freely, but consider supporting the Creative Archive! Featured in Blogs Bart Bonte 's blog Pedro PSIIF-ALIAS's ãã©ã·ã¥ - ç¡æã²ã¼...

item.title: A game-making journey
item.description: About Platformer Template Tidiness rules in All Resources. Connect all the scattered pieces together to regain the harmony within your puzzled mind. How to playControls - keyboard Move with the arrow keys, and push blocks of different shapes. Level difficulty is shown by the number of stars (1 to 5). Press Z to undo a move. Press R to restart the level. Controls - touchscreenTap to simulate pressing X and swipe to simulate an arrow keypress.Real-time feedbackPress F anytime to provide real-time feedback! Much appreciated!Level navigationUsing the Level Selector Menu (below in the game bar) you can navigate freely between all levels.Hall of fameOnce you beat Platformer Template, you'll be invited to enter the Hall of Fame! As soon as you pass the final credits screen after winning, you'll be able to type your name in a new window. Make sure you are connected to the internet, then press Submit to be remembered forever or close the window t...CommunityGuestbookEnjoyed Platformer Template? item.title: Classed as 'Learning'
item.description: About Burokku Konekuta All Tutorials is a puzzle about making puzzles. A meta-game that teaches players how to design a puzzle-platformer step by step. How to playControls - keyboard Move with the arrow keys, and push blocks of different shapes. Level difficulty is shown by the number of stars (1 to 5). Press Z to undo a move. Press R to restart the level. Controls - touchscreenTap to simulate pressing X and swipe to simulate an arrow keypress.Real-time feedbackPress F anytime to provide real-time feedback! Much appreciated!Level navigationUsing the Level Selector Menu (below in the game bar) you can navigate freely between all levels.Hall of fameOnce you beat Burokku Konekuta, you'll be invited to enter the Hall of Fame! As soon as you pass the final credits screen after winning, you'll be able to type your name in a new window. Make sure you are connected to the internet, then press Submit to be remembered forever or close the window t...CommunityGuestbookEnjoyed Burokku Konekuta? Add your message below to the Creative Archive's guestbook!Leave your message! CreditsBurokku Konekuta by Pedro PSI, 2019.MusicBackground music by Ju-nya.TrackYearLicenseTraffic Information2012CC-BY 3.0 Breeze2012CC-BY 3.0Game EngineMade with Puzzlescript.Inspect the source freely, but consider supporting the Creative Archive! Featured in Blogs Bart Bonte 's blog Pedro PSIIF-ALIAS's ãã©ã·ã¥ - ç¡æã²ã¼...

item.title: A game-making journey
item.description: About Platformer Template All Resources is a puzzle about making puzzles. A meta-game that teaches players how to design a puzzle-platformer step by step. How to playControls - keyboard Move with the arrow keys, and push blocks of different shapes. Level difficulty is shown by the number of stars (1 to 5). Press Z to undo a move. Press R to restart the level. Controls - touchscreenTap to simulate pressing X and swipe to simulate an arrow keypress.Real-time feedbackPress F anytime to provide real-time feedback! Much appreciated!Level navigationUsing the Level Selector Menu (below in the game bar) you can navigate freely between all levels.Hall of fameOnce you beat Platformer Template, you'll be invited to enter the Hall of Fame! As soon as you pass the final credits screen after winning, you'll be able to type your name in a new window. Make sure you are connected to the internet, then press Submit to be remembered forever or close the window t...CommunityGuestbookEnjoyed Platformer Template? item.title: Platformer Template
item.description: About Puzzlescript Game Bar Press kit is a puzzle about making puzzles. A meta-game that teaches players how to design a puzzle-platformer step by step. How to playControls - keyboard Move with the arrow keys, and push blocks of different shapes. Level difficulty is shown by the number of stars (1 to 5). Press Z to undo a move. Press R to restart the level. Controls - touchscreenTap to simulate pressing X and swipe to simulate an arrow keypress.Real-time feedbackPress F anytime to provide real-time feedback! Much appreciated!Level navigationUsing the Level Selector Menu (below in the game bar) you can navigate freely Hall of fameOnce you beat Puzzlescript Game Bar, you'll be invited to enter the Hall of Fame! As soon as you pass the final credits screen after winning, you'll be able to type your name in a new window. Make sure you are connected to the internet, then press Submit to be remembered forever or close the window t...CommunityGuestbookEnjoyed Puzzlescript Game Bar? Add your message below to the Creative Archive's guestbook!Leave your message! CreditsPuzzlescript Game Bar by Pedro PSI, 2019.MusicBackground music by .Game EngineMade with Puzzlescript.Inspect the source freely, but consider supporting the Creative Archive! Featured in Blogs Bart Bonte 's blog Pedro PSIIF-ALIAS's ãã©ã·ã¥ - ç¡æã²ã¼...

item.title: All Tutorials
item.description: About All Tutorials How to playControls - keyboard Move with the arrow keys, which are used to interact with blocks of different shapes. Your perception of the goal and game rules should evolve as the game progresses. Press Z to undo a move. Press R to restart the level. Controls - touchscreenTap to simulate pressing X and swipe to simulate an arrow keypress.Real-time feedbackPress F anytime to provide real-time feedback! item.title: Burokku Konekuta
item.description: About Burokku Konekuta Tidiness rules in All Tutorials. Connect all the scattered pieces together to regain the harmony within your puzzled mind. Press Z to undo a move. Press R to restart the level. Controls - touchscreenTap to simulate pressing X and swipe to simulate an arrow keypress.Real-time feedbackPress F anytime to provide real-time feedback! item.title: All Resources
item.description: About All Resources 11 Lessons from a 11-game-making journey is a puzzle about making puzzles. A meta-game that teaches players how to design a puzzle-platformer step by step. How to playControls - keyboard Move with the arrow keys, which are used to interact with blocks of different shapes. Your perception of the goal and game rules should evolve as the game progresses. Press Z to undo a move. Press R to restart the level. Controls - touchscreenTap to simulate pressing X and swipe to simulate an arrow keypress.Real-time feedbackPress F anytime to provide real-time feedback! Much appreciated!Level navigationUsing the Level Selector Menu (below in the game bar) you can navigate freely Hall of fameOnce you beat All Resources, you'll be invited to enter the Hall of Fame! As soon as you pass the final credits screen after winning, you'll be able to type your name in a new window. Make sure you are connected to the internet, then press Submit to be remembered forever or close the window t...CommunityGuestbookEnjoyed All Resources? Add your message below to the Creative Archive's guestbook!Leave your message! CreditsAll Resources by Pedro PSI, 2019.MusicBackground music by .Game EngineMade with Puzzlescript.Inspect the source freely, but consider supporting the Creative Archive! item.title: Puzzlescript Game Bar
item.description: About Puzzlescript Game Bar Press kit is a puzzle about making puzzles. A meta-game that teaches players how to design a puzzle-platformer step by step. How to playControls - keyboard Move with the arrow keys, which are used to interact with blocks of different shapes. Your perception of the goal and game rules should evolve as the game progresses. Press Z to undo a move. Press R to restart the level. Controls - touchscreenTap to simulate pressing X and swipe to simulate an arrow keypress.Real-time feedbackPress F anytime to provide real-time feedback! Much appreciated!Level navigationUsing the Level Selector Menu (below in the game bar) you can navigate freely Hall of fameOnce you beat Puzzlescript Game Bar, you'll be invited to enter the Hall of Fame! As soon as you pass the final credits screen after winning, you'll be able to type your name in a new window. Make sure you are connected to the internet, then press Submit to be remembered forever or close the window t...CommunityGuestbookEnjoyed Puzzlescript Game Bar? Add your message below to the Creative Archive's guestbook!Leave your message! CreditsPuzzlescript Game Bar by Pedro PSI, 2019.MusicBackground music by .Game EngineMade with Puzzlescript.Inspect the source freely, but consider supporting the Creative Archive! Special thanks Â« Hunkydory...

item.title: 11 Lessons from a 11-game-making journey
item.description: Classed as 'Learning' in the Creative Archive

item.title: Press kit
item.description: Introduction Here I share my game making journey, comprising 11 games designed as learning side-project, 7 of them programmed in 2018, including one commercial game launched in early 2019. After a brief motivation, the challenges, achievements and lessons learned from each game are summarised...

item.title: All Tutorials
item.description: These 11 lessons were drawn from my 11-game-making journey in 2018. #1 Know your goal What are you trying to accomplish, and why does it matter to you? Does it have positive effects, like learning a specific new skill? #2 Define your message What should players gain or learn from your game? ...
